For all your newbs out there trying to make this work on Windows 7. (Made this work on Windows 7 Ultimate 32bit)

(N.B. This game will never work on any Intel Integrated Graphics Accelerator no matter how hard you try. Intel has to release the drivers for the cards and that will never happen)

Instructions:
1) Mount Image & Install. Here is a great program to do that. ( http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/downloads )
2) Download the update: worms world party_EUsp1_UK and install ( you can find a link to it somehwere in these comments )
3) Download the Windows 7 fix: wwp_vista_win7_fix_v1.4 ( http://forum.team17.com/showthread.php?s=219f0e53f6dbed3cb0d55e32763a9ec8&t=38883 ) you need to register by the way to download 
4) Make sure you have the File still mounted to play the game.
5) If you want you can download the the CD crack from gamecopyworld.com but be sure to right click it and go into properties>compatibility then go down to settings and check everything. In the game options be sure to only have the resolution at 640 x 480 or else you will get inverted colors.

Hope that helps all you newbs out there trying to figure out how to play this great classic. ENJOY!!!
Oh, and one other thing, If you are going to use the cracked file be sure to copy the data folder from the worms file and then paste it to the installation folder of worms

Hey erik i keep getin a error about some ltkrn10n.dll file, so i downloaded it and copy it in the installation file but the error remains. Any suggestions?

hey jdogg well about your problem I'm not very sure, but did you mount it with deamon tools? If yes, are you running win7? well heres the dll for download, http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?ltkrn10n once you have it, place it in your System32 folder and run regsvr32 via Run in your startmenu. Heres and example regsvr32 " ltkrn10n.dll" this should fix that problem.
